info.title: Renturo API Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for Renturo - Multi-tenant Property Rental Platform. This API serves three main applications: Client App (Property Owners), User App (Renters), and Admin Web Dashboard.

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token with OTP sent to mobile

message.example: Verification code was sent to your mobile number.

verification_code.description: 4-digit OTP (temporary in response, will be removed)

delete.description: Revoke the current user's access token

post.description: Request a new verification code to be sent to the user's mobile number. Rate limited to prevent abuse.

message.example: The verification code for your mobile has been sent to the number +639123456789.
Too many request for verification code. Please retry after waiting for 300 seconds.

put.description: Verify the user's mobile number using the verification code sent via SMS/Email

message.example: Your mobile phone number has been successfully verified.
The code is either not valid or has expired.

get.summary: Get availability for a specific listing
get.description: Retrieve availability slots for any property type with flexible filtering

parameters.name: unit_identifier
parameters.description: Filter by specific unit (for multi-unit properties)

post.description: Create new availability slots for any property type

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific availability slot

post.description: Create availability for multiple dates using templates or date ranges

get.description: Check if a specific time slot is available for booking
Retrieve all bookings for the authenticated user with filtering options

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (pending, confirmed, paid, checked_in, in_progress, completed, cancelled)

post.description: Create a booking with automatic conflict detection and availability locking

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific booking

put.description: Cancel a booking with automatic refund calculation based on cancellation policy

get.description: Check if a booking can be made for the specified dates/times
Retrieve a list of all categories along with their subcategories. This endpoint returns all active categories that are not soft-deleted.

message.example: The mobile number has not been verified yet. Please check your mobile for the verification code.

post.description: Create a new category. Only accessible by authenticated users.

get.description: Retrieve a single category with its subcategories by ID

put.description: Update an existing category by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a category by ID. This will not delete associated subcategories.

get.description: Search for categories by category name or subcategory name. The search is case-insensitive and requires a minimum of 3 characters. Returns a maximum of 10 results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search term (minimum 3 characters). Searches both category and subcategory names.

200.description: Search results (empty array if query is less than 3 characters or no matches found)

message.example: The mobile number has not been verified yet. Please check your mobile for the verification code.

get.description: Retrieve all form availability schedules for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new form availability schedule for a dynamic form

recurring.description: Recurring availability schedule by day of week. Each day contains array of time slots.

get.description: Retrieve a specific form availability schedule

put.description: Update an existing form availability schedule

get.description: Retrieve a list of all dynamic forms with their subcategories and categories
Retrieve all dynamic forms for a specific subcategory

errors.example: No forms found for this subcategory.

get.description: Retrieve a specific dynamic form with all its pages, fields, and submitted values if they exist

errors.example: An error occurred while fetching the form.

put.description: This endpoint is not available for clients as forms can only be updated by administrators

errors.example: Forms can only be managed by administrators.

delete.description: This endpoint is not available for clients as forms can only be deleted by administrators

errors.example: Forms can only be managed by administrators.

get.description: This endpoint is not supported as forms can only be edited by administrators

put.description: Update an existing form submission or create new if doesn't exist

post.description: Submit a completed dynamic form with all field values

dynamic_form_pages.description: Array of form pages with field submissions

errors.example: You have already submitted this form.

get.description: Retrieve a specific form submission with all field values and metadata
Retrieve all form submissions for a specific user
Retrieve all form submissions for a user filtered by store ID
Retrieve a specific form submission for a user by form ID with detailed field values

message.example: Form submission details were fetched successfully.

parameters.name: instant_booking
parameters.description: Show only instant booking listings (1 or 0)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort by field (price_asc, price_desc, rating, newest, popular)

get.summary: Get a single listing by ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of featured listings to retrieve (max 20)

post.description: Upload an image, video, or document to AWS S3. Supports profile photos, listing photos, store logos, posts, and more. Images are automatically resized and thumbnails are generated.

file.description: File to upload (Image: max 10MB, Video: max 50MB)

mediable_type.description: Entity type this media belongs to

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific media file by ID

delete.description: Delete a media file from S3 and database. Only the uploader or entity owner can delete.

get.summary: Client - Get all media for an entity
get.description: Retrieve all media files associated with a specific entity (User, Listing, Store, Post, etc.)
Retrieve all media files uploaded by the authenticated user

patch.description: Set a media file as the primary/featured media for its entity (e.g., primary profile photo, main listing photo)

post.description: Create a new store/venue for the authenticated user. This is typically used when a property owner registers their venue on the platform.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific store owned by the authenticated user, including category and subcategory information.

put.description: Update an existing store owned by the authenticated user.

delete.description: Delete a store owned by the authenticated user. This is a soft delete.

get.description: Retrieve all stores/venues owned by the authenticated user, including category, subcategory, and available dynamic forms.

404.description: Store not found or user ID mismatch

get.description: Retrieve a list of all subcategories with their parent categories

post.description: Create a new subcategory under a specific category

get.description: Retrieve a single subcategory with its parent category by ID

put.description: Update an existing subcategory by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a subcategory by ID

get.description: Retrieve all subcategories for a specific category
Get a paginated list of dynamic forms with their subcategories and categories

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter forms by name or description

post.description: Create a new dynamic form with name, description, and subcategory

get.description: Get detailed information about a dynamic form including its pages and fields

put.description: Update a dynamic form's name, description, or subcategory

subcategory_id.description: New subcategory ID for the form

delete.description: Soft delete a dynamic form and its related pages and submissions

post.description: Restore a soft-deleted dynamic form and its related pages and submissions

get.description: Get detailed information about a form's pages and fields for the form builder

put.description: Update a form's pages and fields in the form builder

sort_no.description: Page sort order (optional, will be set based on array index)

input_field_type.description: Field type (text, textarea, select, radio, checkbox, file, etc.)

sort_no.description: Field sort order (optional, will be set based on array index)

data.description: Additional field data (options for select/radio/checkbox, validation rules for file uploads, etc.)

accept.description: Accepted file types for file upload fields

maxSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes for file upload fields

rows.description: Number of rows for textarea fields

cols.description: Number of columns for textarea fields

error.example: Data format error: One or more input field type have data that cannot be saved.

get.description: Get a paginated list of form fields with their pages and forms

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by field label or name

post.description: Create one or more new form fields for a page

put.description: Update multiple form fields for a form page

get.description: Get a paginated list of dynamic form pages with their fields and form information

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter pages by title or form name

post.description: Create a new dynamic form page with automatic sort order

put.description: Update a dynamic form page with title and sort order management

sort_no.description: New sort order for the page

delete.description: Soft delete a dynamic form page and reorder remaining pages

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the form page to delete

post.description: Restore a soft-deleted dynamic form page and set it as the last page

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the form page to restore

post.description: Update the sort order of multiple form pages in a single operation

form_id.description: ID of the form whose pages are being reordered

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
bearerAuth.name: Authorization

tags.name: Client - Availability
tags.description: Universal availability management for all property types (sports courts, hotels, cars, venues, etc.)

tags.name: Client - Bookings
tags.description: Booking management for all property types with conflict detection and status management

tags.name: Client - Dynamic Form Availability
tags.description: API endpoints for managing dynamic form availability schedules (Client App)

tags.name: Client - Dynamic Form Submissions
tags.description: API endpoints for submitting and managing dynamic form submissions (Client App)

tags.name: Client - Listings
tags.description: API endpoints for browsing and viewing listings (Client/Mobile App)

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: User authentication endpoints (Login, Register, Verify, Password Reset)

tags.name: Admin Dynamic Forms
tags.description: API endpoints for managing dynamic forms in the admin interface

tags.name: Admin Dynamic Form Fields
tags.description: API endpoints for managing form fields in the admin interface

tags.name: Admin Dynamic Form Pages
tags.description: API endpoints for managing dynamic form pages in the admin interface
